title: Introduction to Programming
details: Covers the fundamentals of programming languages, algorithms, and problem-solving.

title: Algorithms
details: Focuses on the study of fundamental data structures and algorithm design techniques.

title: Introduction to C++
details: Explores the internal components and structure of computer systems.

title: Data Structures
details: Introduces database concepts and SQL for data storage and retrieval.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Examines the principles and functions of computer operating systems.

title: Software Engineering
details: Covers web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for building websites and web applications.

title: Python OOP
details: Teaches OOP concepts and design patterns in programming.

title: Database MySQL
details: Explores software development methodologies, project management, and software testing.

title: Problem Solving Part-1
details: Introduces the basics of computer networking and network protocols.
